name: MistytheCloud
0:
”Alexa, ask misty cloud to enable sunset light show”
”Alexa, ask misty cloud to set sleep trainer to idle”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: misty cloud
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Help monitor your child’s nursery with Misty the Cloud: track room temperature, sleep train your toddler, soothe them to sleep with light therapy and record data to your baby’s own personal diary.
This is the official Misty the Cloud skill to be used with the Misty the Cloud smart device from Sweet Dreamers.
If you have any questions, please visit https://www.sweetdreamers.co.uk/AmazonAlexa
